def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.ERP.Comum") from Benner.ERP.Comum import ErpEnvironment
ordemCompra = widget.Entity if ordemCompra == None: return
if ordemCompra.Handle.IsValid(): ErpEnvironment.AtribuirSessionVar("HANDLE_OC_ATUAL_WEB", ordemCompra.Handle.ToString())
if widget.View.Commands["Edit"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = ordemCompra.PodeAlterar if widget.View.Commands["Delete"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = ordemCompra.PodeExcluir if widget.View.Commands["CMD_ENCERRAR"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["CMD_ENCERRAR"].Visible = ordemCompra.PodeEncerrar if widget.View.Commands["MAPA_ANALISE_COTACOES"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["MAPA_ANALISE_COTACOES"].Visible = ordemCompra.VisibilidadeComandoMapaAnaliseCotacoes if widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR_COTACAO"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR_COTACAO"].Visible = ordemCompra.VisibilidadeComandoCancelar and (widget.Entity.Fields["ORIGEM"].Value == 1) if widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = ordemCompra.VisibilidadeComandoCancelar and (widget.Entity.Fields["ORIGEM"].Value <> 1)
